description: High level application HTTP request and resource usage information.

panels.description: The number of pod replicas for the service.
panels.title: Pod Replicas

panels.description: This chart shows the count of pod/container restart events observed.  This will show "CrashLooping" error events.
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: This chart shows the count of pods in an "non-ready" state.
panels.title: Non-Ready Pods

panels.description: CPU usage in relation to the requested cpu for the container.
panels.title: Requested CPU Usage

panels.description: Average recorded CPU usage for each type container within the pods.
panels.title: Actual CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage in relation to the requested memory for the container.
panels.title: Requested Memory Usage

panels.description: Average recorded memory usage for a single type of container within the pods.
panels.title: Actual Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of HTTP requests by status
panels.title: Requests

panels.description: The total number of requests served in the selected time period.
panels.title: Requests Served

panels.description: The mean response time (p100 - all requests) over the selected timeframe.
panels.title: Mean Response Time (p100)

panels.description: The mean response time (p95 - the 95th percentile of requests) over the selected timeframe.
panels.title: Mean Response Time (p95)

panels.description: The mean response time (p50 - the 50th percentile requests) over the selected timeframe.
panels.title: Mean Response Time (p50)

panels.description: Recorded request duration from the ingress controllers in percentiles.
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: The percentage of HTTP responses that are non-error codes vs error codes.
panels.title: Availability

panels.description: The percentage of all HTTP requests that result in a 5xx status.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: This chart shows the number of blocked requests at the ingress level.
panels.title: Blocked Requests

panels.description: The amount of data being sent to and from the pods.
panels.title: Frontend Network I/O

panels.description: The amount of data being sent to and from the pods.
panels.title: Network I/O

title: DataHub deployment status dashboard
